MALIK: (CONTINUE) If it can place these material values in
their proper, subordinate place within the context of
a mighty spiritual movement which will be revolutionary
without being subversive, and which will draw its
substance from the infinite riches of the Western
positive tradition....then the necessity for Communism
will vanish..and the spectre which now walks the earth
will be laid forever..
MUSIC: UP FULL AND FINISH.
J
